section.title: Description
section.p: This class identifies the coverage status of the prescribed drug.

stentry.p: "Code identifying the coverage status of the prescribed drug." - NCPDP Script (Field 7885, Data Dictionary 201104). Possible values include: Approved, Differential Co-Pay, Non Formulary, Not Reimbursed, Preferred, Prior Authorization Required, Signed Prescription, Step Therapy Required, Unknown.
